page.title: 18The Linslade Youth Club
page.content: Every Tuesday the Linslade Youth Club is held. It is held in a big hall in the Community Centre of a large housing estate. Every three weeks there is a disco. On the normal nights the head of the youth club gets out two big table tennis boards and a snooker table for us to play on.There are lots of sweets that you can buy there. When the disco takes place it is held on the stage and there are flashing lights and very loud music. When it is warm and sunny when youth club is on, we go out and have a big game of rounders. Sometimes hardly any people go and the youth club cannot be held. The youth club is on from 7.30p.m. until 9.00p.m. The age group is from 10 to 14 years.
